reviewText:
Like another reviewer stated, the form is poor but I find this form of yoga very interesting.  There are two 30 minute routines and I have yet to get through a 30 minute session but I enjoy doing about 15 minutes once or twice a week.  Essentially, I need a NON namaste type yoga to stretch out my muscles.

Update: PIYO is a better version of this DVD.
To my surprise the instructor on this DVD had very poor form. I also thought she could have been more creative with the weight part of the workout.
I have done this workout several times and it's a very good yoga workout.  I have to accompolish some of her new moves and I am looking forward to that.

Iron Yoga is fantastic-my husband and I both use it!  Gina Cool is a superb instructor-she's extremely knowledable and passionate about what she does.  She definitely walks the talk!  Thanks for bringing your gifts to the masses!
